actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 96-208.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 3914) to amend the National Capital Transportation Act of 1969 to increase the amount authorized for the District of Columbia share of the cost of the rapid transit system of the National Capital Region.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for consideration of H.R. 3914 (National Capital rapid transit system).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 3914) to amend the National Capital Transportation Act of 1969 to increase the amount authorized for the District of Columbia share of the cost of the rapid transit system of the National Capital Region.
